generalScoringRules.scoringMethod: Each question choosing A gets 1 point, choosing B gets 0 points.
generalScoringRules.scoreRange: Each dimension has 3 questions, total score is 0-3 points.

scoreInterpretation.interpretation: Typical preference for this dimension, relatively lacking reverse ability.
Has preference for this dimension, but can call upon reverse ability.
Possesses outstanding reverse ability beyond preference, approaching the level of reverse type.
